short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add bylines back to the NYT homepage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The New York Times removed bylines from their homepage. I added bylines back to their homepage. Now you can tell who wrote the articles. I think this adds more bylines than the page had before. That'll show you, New York Times! Look at all those bylines!
